title: Content & Hiring Coordinator
job_overview:
We’re looking for a reliable and proactive Virtual Assistant to support two key areas:
???? Social media content creation and scheduling
???? Interview and hiring coordination

Responsibilities:
 • Create and schedule engaging content for social media (graphics, captions, reels, etc.)
 • Help manage social media pages (posting, basic engagement)
 • Schedule and coordinate interviews with candidates
 • Conduct initial screening interviews (script provided)
 • Track applicants and assist with onboarding
 • General admin support as needed

Requirements:
 • Excellent English (spoken and written)
 • Strong communication skills and confidence on video/phone
 • Experience with social media tools (Canva, Instagram, Facebook, etc.)
 • Organized, detail-oriented, and dependable
 • Familiarity with Google Workspace
 • Reliable internet and quiet workspace

Bonus:
 • Experience using RingCentral
 • Background in recruiting or hiring
 • Video editing skills (basic)

Details:
 • Remote
 • Part-time 5-10 hours a week
 • Monthly pay
 • Long-term opportunity

To apply:
Send your resume, a 1–2 minute voice recording introducing yourself, and samples of your social media content (if available).
